name: Assemble from Parts
originalText: Target creature card in your graveyard perpetually gains "{3}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Shuffle it into your library. Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie in addition to its other types. Activate only as a sorcery."
text: Target creature card in your graveyard perpetually gains "{1}{B}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Shuffle it into your library. Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie in addition to its other types. Activate only as a sorcery."
